survey.introduction: Hello, I'm calling for a marketing research company, and we're doing a study on products people use.

questions.question: Do you, or your household, subscribe to or purchase THE CO-OP CITY NEWS on a weekly basis?

options.no: TERMINATE AND DO NOT COUNT TOWARD QUOTA

questions.question: Have you, yourself, smoked any cigarettes in the past seven days, or not?

options.no: ASK TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE 18 OR OLDER WHO SMOKES AND REPEAT 1A. IF NO SMOKER TERMINATE

questions.question: About how many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?
questions.note: RECORD THE ACTUAL NUMBER OF CIGARETTES. LESS THAN ONE CIGARETTE PER DAY ASK 1B AGAIN AND IF NO PERSON SMOKES ONE AT HOME 18 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER, WHO SMOKES ONE OR MORE CIGARETTES PER DAY TERMINATE AND DO NOT COUNT TOWARD QUOTA
